t:type.name: SyncDeviceInfo
t:type.t:description: Represents the currently defined reflexes for a given device from the hub's perspective

t:attribute.name: protocol
t:attribute.description: The protocol address of the device

t:attribute.name: driver
t:attribute.description: The name of the driver that defined the current reflexes

t:attribute.name: version
t:attribute.description: The version of the driver that defined the current reflexes

t:attribute.name: hash
t:attribute.description: The hash code of the driver that defined the current reflexes

t:attribute.name: online
t:attribute.description: Indicates whether the device is online or offline

t:attribute.name: degraded
t:attribute.description: Indicates whether the device is operating in a degraded state

t:attribute.name: attrs
t:attribute.description: All of the current attributes for the device.
